about_the_game:
Tilia, who turns 20 this year, is a bit of a tomboy.
One day, while Tilia was working as per her master's orders, a mysterious man appeared in front of her.
The man abducts Tyria and brings her to a man called Sirius.
Sirius reveals that there is a secret behind the death of Tyria's parents.
If you want me to tell you the secret, inside Bill Ballard's royal palace,
I asked him to help me with my investigation.
Tyria, in order to find out the secret of her parents' death,
As one of the servants, he will serve in the royal palace of the Kingdom of Birbarad.
Will the truth behind Tyria's parents' death be revealed?
Is it possible to know?

Otome adventure game. western fantasy
3 characters to capture (Prince, Butler, Phantom Thief)
24 stills
Game progress can be controlled using just the mouse

●Protagonist: Tilia Early Stellato (20)
She has a stronger competitive spirit than most people.
When I get angry, my hands come out before my mouth.
She has fishy eyes and braids.
The memory of the fire from my childhood is still deeply engraved.
While working at a cafe, she met Sirius.
You will work as a servant in the royal palace.

●Capture character: Lantis Luna Nog (22)
Prince of Birbarat Kingdom.
He's such a womanizer that when he sees someone as a woman, he tries to make a move on him.
He also tried to get his hands on Tyria.
She hates men, probably because she had a history of being coerced by men.

●Capture character: Karol Dark Rod (30)
A lookout role introduced by Sirius.
Strict and noisy.
　Extremely dislikes being touched by people.
Play the piano, play the violin,
He has the tastes of an aristocrat and handles everything smoothly.
He is wearing white gloves.

●Capture character: Hanri Flat Labour (24)
The person who abducted Tyria at the request of Sirius.
You might think he's an ordinary citizen, but his true identity is a great phantom thief who is making waves in the world.
Money and goods saved through unscrupulous means are stolen and secretly distributed to the poor.
Because he is in trouble with money, he takes on various requests to supplement his living expenses.
I'm obsessed with money.

The player becomes the main character and chooses his own destiny.
Bring happiness to his beloved and many others.
Visual novel.

Contains nudity or sexual content.
Contains explicit or fresh adult sexual content.

content_descriptors.notes:
This work is intended for adults.
This work includes elements of sexual activity and disagreeable sex.
Contains nudity or sexual content.
Contains explicit or fresh adult sexual content.
